title: Oracle's Chamber Adventure #10
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Oracle's Antechamber
rooms.description: A circular stone chamber lit by flickering torches mounted on ancient walls. Mystical symbols glow faintly on the floor, forming a complex pattern. The air is thick with incense, and whispers seem to echo from nowhere. A heavy wooden door stands to the east, and various artifacts line the walls.

items.name: stone altar
items.description: A weathered altar with carved symbols depicting the sun, moon, and stars

items.name: silver amulet
items.description: An amulet engraved with the symbol of the Oracle

items.name: ancient cabinet
items.description: A tall wooden cabinet with three drawers, each marked with a different celestial symbol

items.name: prophecy scroll
items.description: An ancient scroll with faded writing
items.text: The First Prophecy: Seven seers saw seven visions in the seventh hour. Remember the sacred number: 777. The Oracle speaks only to those who know the Three Truths.

items.name: bronze key
items.description: A key with mystical engravings

items.name: ornate chest
items.description: A chest bound with bronze fittings and a keyhole

items.name: vision tablet
items.description: A stone tablet inscribed with ancient wisdom
items.text: The Second Prophecy: The Oracle dwells beyond the Chamber of Visions. She who sees all was born in the Temple of Seers. Her gift is the Sight Beyond Sight.

items.name: heavy wooden door
items.description: A door carved with images of prophets and seers, leading deeper into the Oracle's domain

rooms.name: Chamber of Visions
rooms.description: A mystical chamber where the walls shimmer with ethereal light. Crystal orbs float in mid-air, each showing swirling mists and fleeting images. Ancient tapestries depicting prophetic visions hang between marble columns. A sense of timelessness pervades the space. The Oracle's inner sanctum lies beyond a sealed door to the north.

items.name: crystal orb of the past
items.description: A floating orb showing images of ancient times
items.text: Within the swirling mists, you see the Oracle as a young girl in the Temple of Seers, receiving her gift of prophecy from the High Priestess.

items.name: crystal orb of the present
items.description: An orb displaying current events across the realm
items.text: The orb shows seekers from distant lands traveling to consult the Oracle, hoping to learn their destinies.

items.name: crystal orb of the future
items.description: A mysterious orb with shifting, unclear visions
items.text: The future remains clouded, but one truth is clear: only those who understand the Oracle's nature may enter her presence.

items.name: tapestry of prophecy
items.description: A grand tapestry showing the Oracle surrounded by symbols
items.text: The tapestry depicts the Oracle in her sanctum, her eyes glowing with inner light. Beneath is written: 'She who possesses the Sight Beyond Sight dwells in the Chamber of Visions, born of the Temple of Seers.'

items.name: marble pedestal
items.description: A pedestal with compartments for sacred offerings

items.name: sacred incense
items.description: Incense used in prophetic rituals

items.name: scroll of wisdom
items.description: A scroll containing the Three Truths
items.text: The Three Truths of the Oracle: First Truth - Where was she born? The Temple of Seers. Second Truth - Where does she dwell? The Chamber of Visions. Third Truth - What is her gift? The Sight Beyond Sight.

items.name: sealed sanctum door
items.description: An imposing door sealed with ancient magic. Three questions are inscribed in glowing script upon its surface.

password_questions.question: Where was the Oracle born?
password_questions.hint: The vision tablet and crystal orbs reveal her origins

password_questions.question: Where does the Oracle dwell?
password_questions.hint: The scroll of wisdom contains the Three Truths

password_questions.question: What is the Oracle's gift?
password_questions.hint: Check the prophecy texts and tapestries

rooms.name: Oracle's Inner Sanctum
rooms.description: You have entered the heart of the Oracle's domain! The chamber glows with divine light emanating from a central dais. Upon a throne of pure crystal sits the Oracle herself, her eyes shimmering with otherworldly knowledge. She smiles knowingly as you approach. Behind her, a portal of swirling light offers passage back to the mortal realm.

items.name: crystal throne
items.description: A magnificent throne carved from a single massive crystal, radiating power and wisdom

items.name: the Oracle
items.description: The legendary Oracle, her presence both comforting and awe-inspiring
items.text: The Oracle speaks: 'You have proven yourself worthy by solving the ancient puzzles and understanding the Three Truths. Your destiny awaits beyond the portal. Go forth with my blessing.'

items.name: sacred dais
items.description: The platform upon which the Oracle's throne rests, inscribed with prophecies

items.name: gem of prophecy
items.description: A radiant gemstone containing a fragment of the Oracle's power

rooms.win_message: The Oracle rises from her throne and blesses you with ancient wisdom. 'You have navigated the trials of my chamber and proven your worth,' she intones. 'Take this knowledge back to the world.' The portal behind her flares brilliantly, and you step through, forever changed by your encounter with the Oracle. You win!
